library.description: OGC Network™ is a window onto the dynamic, constantly changing geospatial web as described by the OGC® Reference Model (ORM). Multiple communities of interest for research in geospatial interoperability are supported, and persistent demonstration capability is provided. Here you will find the latest information on OGC-compatible software, services, and information models (e.g. GML profiles, SLD examples, etc.).

function.description: The OGC Web Map Service (WMS) specification defines an HTTP interface for requesting georeferenced map images from a server. GeoServer supports WMS 1.1.1, the most widely used version of WMS, as well as WMS 1.3.0.
